content.en: Algorithmic sleep treatment: Researchers have been investigating the effectiveness of different algorithms in treating obstructive sleep apnea. These algorithms are used in self-titrating CPAP systems, auto-titrating CPAP devices, and auto-adjusting positive pressure devices. The studies compare the efficacy of different algorithms and devices in titration, management, and monitoring of sleep apnea treatment.
content.da: Algoritmisk søvnbehandling: Forskere har undersøgt effektiviteten af forskellige algoritmer i behandlingen af obstruktiv søvnapnø. Disse algoritmer bruges i selvjusterende CPAP-systemer, auto-justerende CPAP-enheder og auto-regulerende positive tryk-enheder. Studierne sammenligner effektiviteten af forskellige algoritmer og enheder i titrering, håndtering og overvågning af søvnapnøbehandling.
